author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two brothers, M. Ponselvan (12) and M. Karuppasamy (10) of Koothalurani drowned in a pond at Therkku Araikulam on Friday night.

They left the house of their relative’s house at Therkku Araikulam and did not return home till late hours. Their footwear were found near the pond. Fire and Rescue Services personnel retrieved their bodies by 11 p.m. and they were sent to the Government Hospital at Ottapidaram for post mortem.

Pasuvanthanai police have registered a case under Section 174 (drowning) of IPC based on a complaint lodged by P. Madasamy (37), the father of the deceased.
title: Boys drown
